content:
We wanted to update you that after conducting an intensive investigation on the Egyptian and Saudi numbers, we have found that it is working as intended. Attached to this message is a video demonstrating a working scenario with Egyptian and Saudi numbers. We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have found a solution.
If there are any other issues or concerns, please let us know and we will do our best to address them.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.
